text: Paradise Now () is a 2005 Palestinian Dutch French German Israeli drama movie directed by Hany Abu-Assad and starring Kais Nashef, Ali Suliman, Lubna Azabal, Hiam Abbass. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 2006. ==Other websites== * * Category:2005 drama movies Category:Palestinian movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Israeli movies Category:Movies directed by Hany Abu-Assad
title: Paradise Now
